text: Souls in the System is a top-down view scrolling shooter video game created by a company called Terminal Sunset for the Macintosh. This game is a sequel to ShadowWraith. It was designed and developed by Ravi J.K. Mehta of Terminal Sunset Software.Souls in the System User Manual Credits page. The cover illustration was designed by Peter Bollinger and came with the CD containing the program and music files.
